channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NE

item.title: Report X-2024110451
item.description:
Report X-2024110451

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-19T12:23:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-17
  • City: NORTH PLATTE
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 7500
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: CTCX 302880 was involved in a derailment in UPRR's North Platte and came to rest on its side. Approximately one quart of product released to the ballast through the vacuum relief valve.
